tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE liability_insurance (
    policy_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    policyholder_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    coverage_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    endorsement_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE LiabilityInsuranceCoverage (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_holder_name VARCHAR(50),
    coverage_amount DECIMAL,
    valid_from DATE,
    valid_to DATE
);

CREATE TABLE LiabilityInsuranceCoverageDetails ( 
    policy_number VARCHAR(50), 
    insured_name VARCHAR(100), 
    coverage_type VARCHAR(50), 
    start_date DATE, 
    end_date DATE, 
    premium_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) 
);

CREATE TABLE Policyholders ( 
    policyholder_id INT, 
    policy_number VARCHAR(50), 
    holder_name VARCHAR(100), 
    holder_address TEXT, 
    holder_phone VARCHAR(20) 
);

CREATE TABLE Liability_Policies (
	policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	policy_holder_name VARCHAR(50),
	policy_start_date DATE,
	policy_end_date DATE,
	coverage_limit DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Liability_Policies (
    policy_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_holder_name VARCHAR(255),
    coverage_details TEXT,
    effective_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Endorsements (
    endorsement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    endorsement_type VARCHAR(50),
    endorsement_terms TEXT,
    endorsement_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES Liability_Policies(policy_id)
);
